4. Sonic-FX Solo - Delivering 40,000 strokes per minute with 3 brushing modes, a 2-minute timer, and replaceable heads, this toothbrush is ideal for those seeking powerful, hygienic oral care.

5. Quip electric toothbrush - Although it doesn't have the same smart features, it does offer timed sonic vibrations, a 3-month battery, and a slim, travel-friendly design. This might appeal to minimalists who value form, function, and simplicity.

6. The Oral-B Pro 1000 - While it doesn’t have smart capabilities, it uses 3D cleaning action to remove 300% more plaque along the gumline, has a timer, and is dentist-recommended. This could be a great simple, powerful upgrade from manual brushes.

7. FOREO ISSA mikro - Designed for babies, it offers brush and massage modes, never needs head replacement, and helps build early oral care habits. It doesn't fit your age group, but it's a unique choice for parents.
